projects.title: Live Photo Detector Package
projects.description: Liveness detection for face recognition in biometrics is a technique where an algorithm detects if the person in front of the camera is alive and real. Or if someone is trying to fool the system using a static image.

projects.title: The Hindu
projects.description: Hindu Prayer" is your gateway to a spiritually enriched start every day. Begin your mornings with the sacred verses of the Bhagavad Gita, with a carefully curated selection of shlokas to guide and inspire you.

projects.title: Spindle
projects.description: Spindle is for businesses and their customers to administer all type of documents (invoices, receipts, bills and other documents) digitally by eliminate the inconvenience of handling paper for printing transactional document and other associated costs.
